EmailTemplate.description: When an internal user escalates a case by checking the "Request to Escalation Management" box in SFDC, it should email the Escalation Management team (Shaun O'brien's team)
EmailTemplate.name: Request for EM Engagement
EmailTemplate.subject: ATTN: Support Escalation {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.OwnerFullName} is requesting support from the Escalation Management team. Please acknowledge the request by clicking the EM Acceptance box in the case.
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}. Product: {!Case.Products__c}. Product Version: {!Case.Versions__c}. Case Creation Date: {!Case.CreatedDate}.
Link to case: https://pivotal.lightning.force.com/one/one.app?source=alohaHeader#/sObject/{!Case.Id}/view
{!Case.ThreadId__c}
